verses.text: \w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was come \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w*, \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w multitudes|strong="G3793"\w* \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, there \w came|strong="G2064"\w* a \w leper|strong="G3015"\w* and \w worshipped|strong="G4352"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* thou \w wilt|strong="G2309"\w*, thou \w canst|strong="G1410"\w* \w make|strong="G2511"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w clean|strong="G2511"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* put \w forth|strong="G1614"\w* \add his\add* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, and \w touched|strong="G0680"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj \+w I will|strong="G2309"\+w*; \+w be thou clean|strong="G2511"\+w*.\wj* \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w leprosy|strong="G3014"\w* was \w cleansed|strong="G2511"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj \+w See|strong="G3708"\+w* \+w thou tell|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w no man|strong="G3367"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w go thy way|strong="G5217"\+w*, \+w shew|strong="G1166"\+w* \+w thyself|strong="G4572"\+w* \+w to the priest|strong="G2409"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w offer|strong="G4374"\+w* \+w the gift|strong="G1435"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w Moses|strong="G3475"\+w* \+w commanded|strong="G4367"\+w*, \+w for|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w a testimony|strong="G3142"\+w* \+w unto them|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1525"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* was \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Capernaum|strong="G2584"\w*, there \w came|strong="G4334"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* a \w centurion|strong="G1543"\w*, \w beseeching|strong="G3870"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w servant|strong="G3816"\w* \w lieth|strong="G0906"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w home|strong="G3614"\w* sick of the \w palsy|strong="G3885"\w*, \w grievously|strong="G1171"\w* \w tormented|strong="G0928"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w will come and|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w heal|strong="G2323"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

The \w centurion|strong="G1543"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w worthy|strong="G2425"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* thou shouldest \w come|strong="G1525"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w roof|strong="G4721"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w speak|strong="G2036"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w servant|strong="G3816"\w* shall be \w healed|strong="G2390"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w me|strong="G1683"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I \w say|strong="G3004"\w* to \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \add man\add*, \w Go|strong="G4198"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w goeth|strong="G4198"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w another|strong="G0243"\w*, \w Come|strong="G2064"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G1401"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w servant|strong="G1401"\w*, \w Do|strong="G4160"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w doeth|strong="G4160"\w* \add it\add*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add it\add*, he \w marvelled|strong="G2296"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* to them that \w followed|strong="G0190"\w*, \wj \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w I have|strong="G2147"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3761"\+w* \+w found|strong="G2147"\+w* \+w so great|strong="G5118"\+w* \+w faith|strong="G4102"\+w*, no, \+w not|strong="G3761"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w Israel|strong="G2474"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w That|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w many|strong="G4183"\+w* \+w shall come|strong="G2240"\+w* \+w from|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w the east|strong="G0395"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w west|strong="G1424"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w shall sit down|strong="G0347"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w Abraham|strong="G0011"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Isaac|strong="G2464"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Jacob|strong="G2384"\+w*, \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of heaven|strong="G3772"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w the children|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w shall be cast out|strong="G1544"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w outer|strong="G1857"\+w* \+w darkness|strong="G4655"\+w*: \+w there|strong="G1563"\+w* \+w shall be|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w weeping|strong="G2805"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w gnashing|strong="G1030"\+w* \+w of teeth|strong="G3599"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto the \w centurion|strong="G1543"\w*, \wj \+w Go thy way|strong="G5217"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w as|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w thou hast believed|strong="G4100"\+w*, \+add so\+add* \+w be it done|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w unto thee|strong="G4671"\+w*.\wj* \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w servant|strong="G3816"\w* \w was healed|strong="G2390"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G5610"\w* \w selfsame|strong="G1565"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2064"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* was \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Peter’s|strong="G4074"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w*, he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wife’s mother|strong="G3994"\w* \w laid|strong="G0906"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* sick of a \w fever|strong="G4445"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w touched|strong="G0680"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w fever|strong="G4446"\w* \w left|strong="G0863"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* she \w arose|strong="G1453"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ministered|strong="G1247"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w When|strong="G1161"\w* the \w even|strong="G3798"\w* was \w come|strong="G1096"\w*, they \w brought|strong="G4374"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* that were possessed with \w devils|strong="G1139"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he cast \w out|strong="G1544"\w* the \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w* \w with|strong="G3056"\w* \add his\add* \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w healed|strong="G2323"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* that \w were|strong="G2192"\w* \w sick|strong="G2560"\w*:

\w That|strong="G3704"\w* it might be \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* which was \w spoken|strong="G4483"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w Esaias|strong="G2268"\w* the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Himself|strong="G0846"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w infirmities|strong="G0769"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bare|strong="G0941"\w* \add our\add* \w sicknesses|strong="G3554"\w*.

¶ \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1492"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w multitudes|strong="G3793"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, he gave \w commandment|strong="G2753"\w* to \w depart|strong="G0565"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the other \w side|strong="G4008"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* a \w certain|strong="G1520"\w* \w scribe|strong="G1122"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Master|strong="G1320"\w*, I will \w follow|strong="G0190"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w whithersoever|strong="G3699"\w* thou \w goest|strong="G0565"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj \+w The foxes|strong="G0258"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w holes|strong="G5454"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the birds|strong="G4071"\+w* \+w of the air|strong="G3772"\+w* \+add have\+add* \+w nests|strong="G2682"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w hath|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w where|strong="G4226"\+w* \+w to lay|strong="G2827"\+w* \+add his\+add* \+w head|strong="G2776"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w of|strong="G3101"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w suffer|strong="G2010"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w* to \w go|strong="G0565"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bury|strong="G2290"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj \+w Follow|strong="G0190"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w let|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w the dead|strong="G3498"\+w* \+w bury|strong="G2290"\+w* \+w their|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w dead|strong="G3498"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G1684"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was \w entered|strong="G1684"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* a \w ship|strong="G4143"\w*, \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, there \w arose|strong="G1096"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w tempest|strong="G4578"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, insomuch \w that|strong="G5620"\w* the \w ship|strong="G4143"\w* was \w covered|strong="G2572"\w* \w with|strong="G5259"\w* the \w waves|strong="G2949"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was \w asleep|strong="G2518"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* came \w to|strong="G4334"\w* \add him\add*, and \w awoke|strong="G1453"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*: we \w perish|strong="G0622"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj \+w Why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w are ye|strong="G2075"\+w* \+w fearful|strong="G1169"\+w*, \+w O ye of little faith|strong="G3640"\+w*?\wj* \w Then|strong="G5119"\w* he \w arose|strong="G1453"\w*, and \w rebuked|strong="G2008"\w* the \w winds|strong="G0417"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there \w was|strong="G1096"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w calm|strong="G1055"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w marvelled|strong="G2296"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, What manner of \w man|strong="G4217"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* the \w winds|strong="G0417"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* \w obey|strong="G5219"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*!

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2064"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the other \w side|strong="G4008"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w country|strong="G5561"\w* of the \w Gergesenes|strong="G1086"\w*, there \w met|strong="G5221"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* possessed with \w devils|strong="G1139"\w*, coming \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w tombs|strong="G3419"\w*, \w exceeding|strong="G3029"\w* \w fierce|strong="G5467"\w*, so \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w might|strong="G2480"\w* \w pass|strong="G3928"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, they cried \w out|strong="G2896"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* have \w we|strong="G2254"\w* to \w do|strong="G2532"\w* with \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, thou \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*? art thou \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w hither|strong="G5602"\w* to \w torment|strong="G0928"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* the \w time|strong="G2540"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* there \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a good way \w off|strong="G3112"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* an \w herd|strong="G0034"\w* of \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w swine|strong="G5519"\w* \w feeding|strong="G1006"\w*.

\w So|strong="G1161"\w* the \w devils|strong="G1142"\w* \w besought|strong="G3870"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w If|strong="G1487"\w* thou \w cast|strong="G1544"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w out|strong="G1544"\w*, \w suffer|strong="G2010"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* to go \w away|strong="G0565"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w herd|strong="G0034"\w* of \w swine|strong="G5519"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj \+w Go|strong="G5217"\+w*.\wj* \w And|strong="G1161"\w* when they were come \w out|strong="G1831"\w*, they \w went|strong="G0565"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w herd|strong="G0034"\w* of \w swine|strong="G5519"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w whole|strong="G3956"\w* \w herd|strong="G0034"\w* of \w swine|strong="G5519"\w* ran \w violently|strong="G3729"\w* \w down|strong="G2596"\w* a steep \w place|strong="G2911"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w perished|strong="G0599"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w waters|strong="G5204"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they that kept \w them|strong="G1006"\w* \w fled|strong="G5343"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* went their \w ways|strong="G0565"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, and \w told|strong="G0518"\w* every \w thing|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* what was \w befallen|strong="G3588"\w* to the possessed of the \w devils|strong="G1139"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w whole|strong="G3956"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* came \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w meet|strong="G4877"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* when they \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, they \w besought|strong="G3870"\w* \add him\add* \w that|strong="G3704"\w* he would \w depart|strong="G3327"\w* \w out|strong="G0575"\w* \w of|strong="G3725"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w coasts|strong="G3725"\w*.
